scripts.dev-run: npm run pretest-clear && npx cypress run --env configFile=dev
scripts.local-run: npm run pretest-clear && npx cypress run --env configFile=local
scripts.pretest-clear: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-reports
scripts.generate-report: mkdir -p mocha-reports && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json > mocha-reports/report.json && npx marge mocha-reports/report.json -f report -o mocha-reports
